title: Mild cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located next to the Kasalong Gardens Home cafe, this place offers 2 menus - one with thai food, the other with western food. Thai food is cheaper and has much more vegan choices including dishes with tofu and brown rice, noodles, soups, curries, spring rolls, plus fruit smoothies and shakes. They also sell soy ice cream, soy yoghurt, and hill tribe coffee. Owners speak English. Has Wi-Fi.
